definitions: a person who does not belong to a particular group

examples.text: to the outsider, glitzy fashion shows may seem an outrageous extravagance

shortDefinitions: person who does not belong to particular organization or profession

definitions: a person who is not accepted by or who is isolated from society

examples.text: she felt that his friends despised her as an outsider

shortDefinitions: person who is not accepted by or who isolates themselves from society

definitions: a competitor, applicant, etc. thought to have little chance of success

examples.text: he started as a rank outsider for the title

shortDefinitions: competitor, applicant, etc. thought to have little chance of success
